name: Swift4
body: CVCalendar is now compatible with the latest Swift syntax and Xcode 9.

name: Hotfix initial circle not showing
body:
This release mostly fixes #470 #471. 

See Changelog for detailed changes.

name: Bugfixes for 1.5.0
body: See [Changelog](https://github.com/CVCalendar/CVCalendar/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md) for full list of changes.

name: Date range selection & further API improvements
body:
This pre-release includes the following improvements.

- Date range selection is now possible
- Demo improvements
- Minor bug fixes

Please see Changelog for the full list of solved issues.

name: Rotation and Layout Fixes
body:
This minor release includes the following improvements.
- Rotation issues have been resolved
- Unnecessary get keyword removed
- Supply custom calendar for custom localization.

Please see Changelog for the full list of solved issues.

name: Swift 3
body:
This major release includes the following improvements.
- Update Syntax to Swift 3
- Remove CVDate typealias
- Remove XCode warnings

Please see Changelog for the full list of solved issues.

name: 1.3.1 - Last Swift 2
body:
This release includes minor bug fixes and improvements.
- Introduced delegate method for customizing animation duration of date selection
- Nil safety for supplementarySetup in CVCalendarDayView

Please see Changelog for the full list of solved issues.

This release includes major bug fixes and improvements.
- Swift Syntax 2.2
- Remove all warnings and merged duplicate copies (pod/demo)
- Fixed memory leakage
- Added APIs for changing Font, Color & Size of each weekday, Topmarker Color, prevent day selection

name: Carthage Compatibility
body: Added a new Xcode Project with a shared scheme.

- Add some convenience methods for refresh of presented month, get presented week, etc.
- Bugfixes
- Minor Refactoring

name: [1.1.1] Release Beta
body:
Beta release, info can be found [here](https://github.com/Mozharovsky/CVCalendar/issues/28). 

## Enhancements
- [x] Transition animation between modes (week-month) #17 
- [x] Localization 
- [x] Custom fonts for both menu and dates' labels 
- [x] Dynamic content size (week and day views)

## Major bug fixes
- [x] Committing frames' update only once #18 #22 #31
- [x] CVDate math for days out #23 
- [x] Toggling to current day view if it isn't selected #30 
- [x] Unmanaged dragging of content view (scroll area)
- [x] Top marker glitch on first load 
- [x] Glitch on chaotic scroll 
- [x] Delay on appearing (make a lazy init on content view)
- [x] Major optimisation (retain cycle issue between views)
- [x] Delegate notification on toggling or month change 
- [x] Interaction with invisible day views
- [x] Double first day in month selection
- [x] MonthContentViewController optimization
- [x] WeekContentViewController optimization
